section.p: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g. splenectomy). This clinical statement represents any procedure that cannot be classified as an observation or a procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these procedures are a dressing change, teaching or feeding a patient or providing comfort measures.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 MoodCodeEvnInt STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8290)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8292)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8293)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 ProcedureActStatusCode DYNAMIC (CONF:8298)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8299)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:8300)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8301)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] serviceDeliveryLocation (CONF:8313)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] procedureEncounter (CONF:8317)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] instructions (CONF:8325)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:8328)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] medicationActivity (CONF:8329)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
code in a procedure activity observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:8294)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8295)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:8296)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8297)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8312)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8324)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 MoodCodeEvnInt STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8290)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:8300)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8301)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] serviceDeliveryLocation (CONF:8313)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] instructions (CONF:8325)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:8328)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] medicationActivity (CONF:8329)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
code in a procedure activity observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:8294)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8295)

reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8297)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8312)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8324)
